pullRequest.title: Skip broker failure self-healing if abnormaly large amount of brokers die simultaneously

commit.message: Skip broker failure self-healing if abnomaly large amount of brokers die simultaneously.

nodes.bodyText: Can we make this method static?
Since the focus of this patch is the addition of these configs, can we also make them configurable in this patch rather postponing it?
Nit: For consistency with the relevant config: deadBrokerCount -> failedBrokerCount?
The role of this config is not clear from the name. Should we add a comment to clarify?

0.2 means that in a cluster of 9 brokers, more than 1 broker failure cannot be handled. This seems a little aggressive to me.
Can we set the default FIXABLE_BROKER_FAILURE_PERCENTAGE_UPPER_BOUNDARY  and FIXABLE_BROKER_FAILURE_UPPER_BOUNDARY to less aggressive values to avoid a dramatic change in the existing behavior?

This comment seems inconsistent with the operation -- i.e. this piece of code just sets a config value.
Can we move this comment to the relevant function that interprets this config?
This seems to subsume / hide the detail on non-fixable broker failure state. Can we make sure that this information is exposed in (1) alerts, (2) logs, and (3) anomaly detector state?
Can we clarify what it means to be fixable for broker failures?
Can we add unit tests for this new functionality?

Based on the current defaults, fixable.failed.broker.count.threshold will be the limiting factor in any cluster larger than 12 brokers. Should we adjust these limits such that they map to the equal broker count for a medium cluster size -- e.g. a cluster of 25 brokers leads to fixable.failed.broker.count.threshold default value of 10?
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -112,6 +112,8 @@ The following configurations are inherited from the open source Kafka client con

 | metric.anomaly.analyzer.metrics               | String  | N         | ""                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     | The metric ids that the metric anomaly detector should detect if they are violated.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        |
 | failed.brokers.zk.path                        | String  | N         | /CruiseControlBrokerList                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               | The zk path to store the failed broker list. This is to persist the broker failure time in case Cruise Control failed and restarted when some brokers are down.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     |
+| fixable.failed.broker.count.threshold         | Integer | N         | 5                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |The upper boundary of concurrently failed broker count that are taken as fixable.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     |

nodes.bodyText: Isn't it sufficient to make this and _fixableFailedBrokerCountThreshold  a Short?
